3.0.1.name: wordpress/nice-trailingslashit
3.0.1.description: When we are define our WordPress's permalinks like "/archives/%post_id%.html", the feed link will be like "/feed", and the category's link, the tag's link will be also no have "/" at the end, but some times we need add "/" at the end at the all page but blog content. so i'm write the plugin.
